CustomField.description: Check if gap exists between the contract scope and the condition scope (BU, Products, Dates).
CustomField.formula: If( AND(Product_Scope__c = Contract__r.Supplier_Nego_Scope__c, BU_Scope__c = Contract__r.Contract_BU__c, Disc_BDate__c = Contract__r.Contract_BDate__c, Disc_EDate__c = Contract__r.Contract_EDate__c, OR(unit_amount__c = 0, AND(unit_amount__c <> 0, OR(TEXT(Unit_Amount_Type__c) = 'Piece', TEXT(Unit_Amount_Type__c) = 'UC')))) , True, False)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Précise si la condition suit le scope du contrat ou un scope spécifique
CustomField.label: Respects Contract Scope
